channel.title: agile on Alexandre Vicenzi
channel.description: Recent content in agile on Alexandre Vicenzi

item.title: Is my project failing?
item.description: In today’s article, I’m going to talk about things that I’ve seen over the years that slowly were contributing to the failure of a project, and how to avoid it.

item.title: Building an engineering team
item.description: In today’s article, I’m going to share my thoughts on how to build a Dev team, what does it take, and how you can tell if you built a good team, as well as what is a good team.
